detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Beginning Latin II. Visit amne.ubc.ca for full course descriptions.

If the course is full or blocked, or if you do not meet restrictions for the available seats, please register for the waitlist. Students will be moved manually from the waitlist into the course section in order of registration. If the course is blocked but showing available seats, this is normal and means that waitlist transfer have not yet taken place. Email amne.undergrad@ubc.ca with any questions.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Beginning Latin II. Visit amne.ubc.ca for full course descriptions.

If the course is full or blocked, or if you do not meet restrictions for the available seats, please register for the waitlist. Students will be moved manually from the waitlist into the course section in order of registration. If the course is blocked but showing available seats, this is normal and means that waitlist transfer have not yet taken place. Email amne.undergrad@ubc.ca with any questions.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Beginning Latin II. Visit amne.ubc.ca for full course descriptions.

This is an asynchronous web-based course. You may register in this course even if the time conflicts with another course.

If the course is full or blocked, or if you do not meet restrictions for the available seats, please register for the waitlist. Students will be moved manually from the waitlist into the course section in order of registration. If the course is blocked but showing available seats, this is normal and means that waitlist transfer have not yet taken place. Email amne.undergrad@ubc.ca with any questions.

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value: If you meet the requirements for the course/waitlist but are not able to self-register, please fill out this 2024 Winter Session Registration Request for LFS Courses form. An LFS Academic Advisor will assess your eligibility for registration and you will be notified accordingly.

instances.text: LFS_V 150-007 - Scholarly Writing and Argumentation in Land and Food Systems

detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
This course is run SYNCHRONOUSLY, meaning students have to log on and participate at the posted days/times.   

If you meet the requirements for the course/waitlist but are not able to self-register, please fill out this 2024 Winter Session Registration Request for LFS Courses form. An LFS Academic Advisor will assess your eligibility for registration and you will be notified accordingly.

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
